mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, name, loginname, address, sex, remark, pwd, deptid, hiredate, mgr, available, ordernum, type, imgpath, salt ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mgr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginname = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hiredate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mgr = #{mgr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordernum = #{ordernum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imgpath = #{imgpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, loginname, address, sex, remark, pwd, deptid, hiredate, mgr, available, ordernum, type, imgpath, salt from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, loginname, address, sex, remark, pwd, deptid, hiredate, mgr, available, ordernum, type, imgpath, salt from sys_user
